artist: Painter: After William Hogarth; Engraver: John Henry Robinson; Publisher: John Major
description: bust length portrait of man wearing coat with fur collar and large beret; short curly hair; earring; turned left and looking out
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscription

in plate in black: Hogarth pinx\'t   H. Robinson sculp\'t / JOHN PINE / LONDON / Published by John Major, 50 Fleet Street / Frb\'y 15th 1828 | on sheet in pencil: 2-206
title: Portrait of John Pine
